name: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2: Lode Runner Collection
overview: Hudson Best Collection Vol. 2: Lode Runner Collection, is the second in a series of six compilation titles for the Game Boy Advance that contains emulated versions of Famicom games. It was released in 2005. This collection, as the name implies, contains both Lode Runner games which were developed by Hudson and released on the Famicom, namely: - Lode Runner - Championship Lode Runner
